Translation: This ball is new/ a new thing
a ball that is new to a friend
the face that used to be pretty
I dread calling the sick friend.
a person whose home is in India
Rina gave a present to a friend.

Comment: This sentence can have ambiguity, i.e. a friend who dances the old-style dance.
Native speakers comment that the stacking of such prenouns is quite rare.
